FUNC.NAME: upcEanBookland
FUNC.PATH: Barcode Scanner\Decoder and Parameter Tags\Upc Ean
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is an action tag used to enable or disable decoding of upcEanBookland barcodes.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to decode upcEanBookland barcodes:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="allDecoders:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="upcEanBookland:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: Above example can also be written as shown below:

EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-all_decoders" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-upcEanBookland" Content="true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example disables the scanner from decoding upcEanBookland barcodes:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="allDecoders:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="upcEanBookland:false"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports decoding of upcEanBookland barcodes.
